mapper.select: SELECT fr.ID, fr.REPORT_TYPE, fr.ICON, frt.TITLE, frt.DESCRIPTION, fr.PATH, fr.SORT, fr.type_sequence, fr.MODULE, fr.VISIBILITY FROM FD_REPORT fr JOIN FD_PROJECT_MAP_CATEGORY fpmc ON fpmc.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} JOIN FD_PROJECT_CATEGORY fpc ON fpc.id = fpmc.CATEGORY_ID JOIN FD_REPORT_PROJECT_CATEGORY frpc ON frpc.REPORT_ID = fr.id left join FD_REPORT_Tl frt on (frt.lang =#{lang} and frt.id = fr.id) AND frpc.PROJECT_CATEGORY = fpc.`CODE` AND fr.MODULE= #{module} GROUP BY fr.ID
